Uses of Interface
Support.mvc.IModel

  • Packages that use IModel 
    Package Description
    Hexxagon.Model
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the model layer of Hexxagon module.
    Support.mvc
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed for creation of Model View Controller based applications.
    Window
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the pages and main functionalities of the application.

    • Uses of IModel in Hexxagon.Model

      Classes in Hexxagon.Model that implement IModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameData
      It is the Data Access Object of the Hexxagon module.

    • Uses of IModel in Support.mvc

      Classes in Support.mvc that implement IModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TModel
      Generalised implementation of model component specified by IModel interface.
      Fields in Support.mvc declared as IModel 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IModel TController.model
      Contains the attached model available.
      Methods in Support.mvc that return IModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IModel IController.getModel()
      Retrieves the attached model instance reference.
      IModel TController.getModel()
      Retrieves the attached model instance reference.
      Methods in Support.mvc with parameters of type IModel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IController.setModel(IModel model)
      Attaches the model component to the class.
      void TController.setModel(IModel model)
      Attaches the model component to the class.

    • Uses of IModel in Window

      Classes in Window that implement IModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Storage
      Contains implementation of data component of application.
